## Pages
- [Account Settings - Get The Receipts](/settings): Manage your account settings, privacy preferences, and data.
- [Pricing - Choose Your Power Level](/pricing): Savage pricing for savage truths. Choose a plan from Free to Founder
- [Privacy Policy - Get The Receipts](/privacypolicy): Read our Privacy Policy to understand how Get The Receipts collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
- [Quiz - Tell Us More | Get The Receipts](/quiz): Answer a few quick questions to give us the context behind the text message. Your gut feeling matters!
- [Refer & Earn - Get The Receipts](/referral): Share the love, get more receipts! Invite friends to Get The Receipts and earn points to redeem for premium rewards.
- [Spill The Tea - Get The Receipts](/chatinput): Paste the texts and let Sage expose what
- [Terms of Service - Get The Receipts](/termsofservice): Read the Terms of Service for Get The Receipts. These terms govern your use of our website and services.
- [Your Dashboard - Get The Receipts](/dashboard): Manage your account, view your past receipts, and access premium features.
